attributes.action: Arrange a referendum on Assisted Dying.
attributes.background: A recent public poll showed that 82% of the people polled were in favour of Assisted Dying.  MPs rejected the bill in a ratio of 3 to 1.  Parliament is obviously out of touch with constituents.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106652

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
